name: V. István catholic vocational high school and grammar school
short_list: I studied at the small school in Sátoraljaújhely for 4 years. Here I got my first profession in computer science, which was system operator / system administrator.

name: V. István catholic vocational high school and grammar school
short_list: I stayed at this school for a year to get extra knowledge in system operation. This is when I first became interested in programming.

name: Gábor Dénes University
short_list: I graduated from this university (formerly a college). In my first year I went to Siófok and later to the Budapest campus. Here I learned backend ( C#, Java ) and frontend ( HTML, CSS, JS ) development, but also other math and network development subjects.
